xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the wmi57_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the wmi57_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the wmi57_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the wmi57_test.

xccdf:Rule.xccdf:title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using ALL_EXIST value.
xccdf:Rule.xccdf:description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the win:Wmi57_test.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result equals Server, Server.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result is not equal to workstation, workstation.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result case insensitive equals sErVeR, SerVEr.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result is case insensitive not equal to workstation, workstation.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result matches the regular expression Serve[Rr], Serve[Rr].

metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result equals workstation, workstation.

metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result is not equal to Server, Server.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result case insensitive equals workstation, workstation.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result is case insensitive not equal to sERver, SErvER.

metadata.title: Test the result entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the result entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the result matches the regular expression [wW]orks.*, [wW]orks.*.

metadata.title: Test the wql entity with the equals operation
